titles.title: Commending Southern California Wineries and Vineyards Resolution.
Commending Southern California Wineries and Vineyards Resolution.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Nutrition, Foreign Agriculture, and Horticulture.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes (1) the importance of southern California wine growers and the wine industry to California; and (2) the significant contributions of the southern California wine industry to the U.S. economy, tourism industry, and job market.
